fields.Title of Presentation: Rethinking Global Capitalism: A View from the Mountain West
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: CUIBE Spring 2021 Conference Rethinking Global Capitalism: A View from the Mountain West
fields.Conference Location: Online (originally planned for Jackson Hole Wyoming)
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Consortium on Undergraduate International Business Education
fields.Description/Abstract: In addition to co-hosting, creating, and managing the conference structure and format, I gave opening remarks on the topic "Rethinking Global Capitalism: A View from the Mountain West," acted as MC for the entire conference, and gave closing remarks.
